ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Yes of course. It is an excellent wayto become a better presenter and evaluate literature.
yes. Many interesting papers and alot practice of presentation skills.
I would definitely recommend this course to another student. I think it gave us excellent exposure to current scientific topics.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: As previously mentioned, the course is great for developing presentation skills and learning how to properly evaluate the scientific literature.
Covered some research areas in pathology and provided basic knowledge for future research. Helpful for deciding dissertation.
I think course has provided further insight into current cancer topics and has made me consider going into a cancer research lab.
